snippet: Supporters of Maryland's same-sex marriage law hope to parlay the backing of President Obama, who is expected to win the state, into a victory.
abstract: Supporters of Maryland's same-sex marriage law hope to parlay the backing of President Obama, who is expected to win the state, into a victory.

headline.main: Fate of Maryland Same-Sex Marriage Ballot Measure Is Uncertain
